a. Ivan uzhe privyk, chto ego rasskazu ne verjat ili
Ivan already got.used, that his story.ACC not believe.3PL or
ponimajut ego kak-to izvrashchenno. Oni ved' ne
understand.3PL it.ACC somehow perversely. They indeed not
vstrechalis' s d'javolom.
have.met with devil.

somehow perversely. Unlike him, they haven't met the devil.'
